components.mentoring.session.iterationsL:
**Functional Purpose**: Accessibility label for the button to navigate to the previous iteration.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration navigation (Previous button)
**When Users See This**: When the navigation buttons are visible, particularly when moving between iterations in a mentoring session.
**Technical Context**: Used as `aria-label` for a button. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Go to previous iteration"

**Functional Purpose**: Hint text for the previous iteration navigation button.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration navigation (Previous button hint)
**When Users See This**: When the navigation buttons are visible, to indicate the previous iteration.
**Technical Context**: Displayed next to the left arrow icon. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Previous"

**Functional Purpose**: Accessibility label for the button to navigate to the next iteration.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration navigation (Next button)
**When Users See This**: When the navigation buttons are visible, particularly when moving between iterations in a mentoring session.
**Technical Context**: Used as `aria-label` for a button. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Go to next iteration"

**Functional Purpose**: Hint text for the next iteration navigation button.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session iteration navigation (Next button hint)
**When Users See This**: When the navigation buttons are visible, to indicate the next iteration.
**Technical Context**: Displayed next to the right arrow icon. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Next"
toggleMoreInformationButton.expand:
**Functional Purpose**: Accessibility label for an icon that indicates an expandable section.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session â†’ Student information (Expand/Collapse button icon)
**When Users See This**: When the 'More Information' section is collapsed and can be expanded.
**Technical Context**: Used as `alt` attribute for an `Icon` component. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "expand"
